title: RP for a drawing?
body:
Hi Riot,I heard you can get some free RP for a drawing, I would really like 25 RP to spend on your game! :)
Here's a link to a drawing I did https://imgur.com/a/cXrrV

replies.body: Oh snap, you knew exactly what to draw to get this poro's attention xD! Check your account again, you should already have that extra RP ^_^!
Thank you very much! *feed poro snack*
